headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks on Our Watchlist
summary: The best-performing stocks typically have robust sales growth, increasing margins, and rising returns on capital, and those that can maintain this trifecta year in and year out often become the legends of the investing world.

headline: These 3 Dividend Stocks Just Raised Their Payouts. Are They Buys Here?
summary: With recent dividend increases from Lam Research, Ingredion, and Nordson signaling management confidence in cash flows, all three stocks offer compelling income opportunities with analyst "Moderate Buy" ratings and potential upside.
